name: Myrabelle
description:
Myrabelle is alerted to a strange creature lurking in a cave nearby. Upon investigating, she finds a humanoid creature with red skin and big horns. When the unusual creature informs Myrabelle that her world is now being merged with another, they must band together to save the realm for chaos.

PLEASE NOTE: This is a short introduction to a game that is on hold indefinitely. If you've played Avalon and / or Penny for Your Thoughts and you'd like to see more of my representative Myrabelle, this is a 15 minute mini episode featuring her. There is nudity but no sexual content.
